content.heroHeader: CapoBrain Dashboard - School Management Overview
content.heading: Dashboard
content.description: After logging in successfully, the CapoBrain Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of all school operations. It features real-time updates on student records, class schedules, financial summaries, and much more. Users can filter data by school branch and access important details at a glance, improving school management and decision-making.

details: Number of Students / Staff

meta.title: Visitors Meeting | CapoBrain School Management System
meta.description: Manage and schedule meetings with staff or students seamlessly using CapoBrain's Visitors Meeting module. Ensure an efficient process by adding staff or student information and setting meeting purposes for effective communication.

openGraph.title: Visitors Meeting | CapoBrain School Management System
openGraph.description: Streamline scheduling and managing meetings with staff and students in the Visitors Meeting module of CapoBrain. Add necessary information and configure meeting purposes to ensure smooth interactions.

twitter.title: Visitors Meeting | CapoBrain School Management System
twitter.description: Simplify your school’s visitor management system with CapoBrain, featuring scheduling and configuration of meetings with staff and students.

content.heroHeader: Seamless Visitor and Meeting Management with CapoBrain
content.heading: Visitors Meeting
content.description: The Visitors Meeting module allows you to efficiently schedule and manage meetings with staff or students. You must first ensure the respective person is added through their respective modules (Teaching Staff for staff, and New Admission for students). Once added, an ID is generated for easy search and meeting scheduling. This streamlined process ensures that all meetings are well-organized, promoting smooth communication across the school.

image.alt: Adding a Visitors Meeting

details: Add a Teacher or Student First to enable meeting scheduling.
Configure the meeting purpose from the Configure Front Office submodule for efficient management.
Complete all mandatory fields to ensure proper meeting setup.
Non-mandatory fields can be left blank but help provide additional meeting details.
Track all scheduled meetings with ease using CapoBrain’s organized system.

meta.title: Phone Call Log | CapoBrain School Management System

content.heading: Phone Call Log
content.description: This module allows you to log all incoming and outgoing calls related to the school. You must enter the caller's name, phone number, call duration, and status to complete the call details. All fields are mandatory, and you can view a comprehensive list of all call logs.
details: Log incoming and outgoing calls with detailed information.
Record essential details such as the caller's name, phone number, and duration.
Track the status of calls (e.g., answered, missed, or voicemail).
Generate reports based on call logs for efficient communication management.
Easily search and filter call records to find specific communication history.

image.alt: Phone Call Log

content.heroHeader: Efficient Teaching Staff Management with CapoBrain
content.heading: Teaching Staff
content.description: The Teaching Staff module in CapoBrain's School Management System (SMS) allows schools to efficiently manage and organize teaching staff details. Teachers can add personal information, academic qualifications, work experience, and other talents. Additionally, by configuring Nationality, Religion, and Designation in the settings, schools can tailor the profile creation process. The system automatically generates a unique Teacher ID for each teacher, which helps in easy access to their personal portal. This feature enhances overall administrative efficiency, making staff management seamless and organized.

image.alt: Add Teacher in CapoBrain School Management System

details: Add Nationality, Religion, and Designation to the configuration module before inputting teacher information.
Image size should be less than or equal to 100 KB for uploading teacher profile pictures.
The instructor document file size should be less than or equal to 300 KB.
The system generates a unique Teacher ID automatically for easy access to the teacher portal.
View and update teacher profiles with ease for effective management.

content.description: CapoBrain's Non-Teaching Staff module provides an easy-to-use interface for managing all non-teaching staff members in your school. You can input personal information, job titles, and update any staff details as necessary. Before entering data, you need to configure Nationality, Religion, and Designation in the settings. The module allows easy browsing and editing of staff information, ensuring efficient management and smooth administrative operations. Whether updating current staff details or adding new staff members, CapoBrain's non-teaching staff management module simplifies the process.

details: Configure Nationality, Religion, and Designation in the settings before entering staff details.
Image size should be less than or equal to 100 KB for profile pictures.
The instructor document file size should be less than or equal to 300 KB.
Easily update job titles and personal details for non-teaching staff members.

Users can also view a list of all assigned tasks, making it easier to oversee staff workloads and track completion.

This feature enhances administrative control and ensures proper documentation of all staff withdrawals.

content.heading: Passout Students
content.description: CapoBrain's School Management System (SMS) allows you to manage passout students efficiently by withdrawing them from the student list. Once you enter the reason for passout and withdraw the student, their data is moved to the passout students list, ensuring your main student list remains up to date. This feature helps maintain accurate records of students who have completed their studies or moved on.

image.alt: Add Passout Student in CapoBrain School Management System

details: Search for the student by ID before entering the reason for passout.
Withdraw the student to move their data to the passout students list.
The student's data will be removed from the main student list once they are marked as passout.
Maintains accurate student records by displaying passout students separately.

content.heading: Promote Students
content.description: CapoBrain’s School Management System provides two options for promoting students: single student promotion and full class promotion. With single student promotion, you can search for a student by ID and select the new class and section for their promotion. Alternatively, you can use the full class promotion option for mass promotion, saving time and effort. This feature ensures a seamless transition for students to the next academic year.

details: First, add classes and sections to the configuration module in the School Management System (SMS).

openGraph.description: Effortlessly manage student reviews with CapoBrain’s School Management System. Search by ID, rate performance, and track evaluations for effective feedback management.

twitter.title: Student Review | CapoBrain School Management System
twitter.description: With CapoBrain’s School Management System, search for students, rate their performance, and track reviews efficiently to ensure continuous improvement.

content.heroHeader: Student Reviews Made Easy
content.heading: Student Review
content.description: If a school user wants to post a review about any student in the School Management System (SMS), they may search by ID. There are questions and a rating box where you can provide a rating based on their performance. This tool ensures schools can evaluate students effectively and manage feedback for continuous improvement. Once saved, it will display a list of all student reviews, allowing for easy tracking and management of student evaluations.

image.alt: Add Student Review in CapoBrain School Management System

details: Search by student ID to find the student.
Provide ratings based on the student's performance.
Save the review and track it in the review list.

meta.title: Withdraw Students | CapoBrain School Management System
meta.description: Simplify student withdrawals with CapoBrain's School Management System. Search by ID, add withdrawal reasons, and maintain accurate records of withdrawn students.

openGraph.title: Withdraw Students | CapoBrain School Management System
openGraph.description: Manage student withdrawals efficiently with CapoBrain. Search by ID, enter reasons, and maintain well-organized records for streamlined school operations.

twitter.title: Withdraw Students | CapoBrain School Management System
twitter.description: CapoBrain’s School Management System makes it easy to manage withdrawals. Record reasons, update lists, and maintain accurate data effortlessly.

content.heroHeader: Effortless Student Withdrawals
content.heading: Withdraw Students
content.description: If you want to withdraw any student from the school, you can do so by searching for the student by ID and entering the reason for withdrawal. This feature ensures schools maintain accurate withdrawal records and stay organized. After the student is withdrawn, they will be removed from the active student list and added to the withdrawn students list with the provided reasons. This tool simplifies the process, saving time and improving operational efficiency in the School Management System (SMS).
details: Search for the student by ID.
Enter the reason for the withdrawal.
Withdrawn students will be moved to the withdrawn list with the reasons recorded.

image.alt: Add Withdraw Student in CapoBrain School Management System

meta.title: Family Wise Account | CapoBrain School Management System
meta.description: Access and manage family-wide student details in CapoBrain's School Management System. Monitor records like ID, name, class, section, and balance with ease.

openGraph.title: Family Wise Account | CapoBrain School Management System
openGraph.description: Keep track of family-wide student records with CapoBrain. View details like ID, name, class, section, and balance for improved transparency and communication.

twitter.title: Family Wise Account | CapoBrain School Management System
twitter.description: CapoBrain’s School Management System empowers families with all-in-one access to student details, enhancing transparency and communication.

content.heroHeader: All-In-One Family Accounts
content.heading: Family Wise Account Overview
content.description: Every student adds family details in their admission form, leading to the creation of a family-wise account once the student is accepted. This feature empowers parents with instant access to essential details such as the child's ID, name, class, section, and overall balance. The family-wise account ensures transparency and improved engagement between the school and parents. With this feature, schools can foster better collaboration with families and provide a seamless experience. Parents can access this information through their portal, ensuring they stay informed about their child's educational journey.
details: Provides a comprehensive view of student information for families.
Allows parents to monitor educational progress and financial details.
Easy access to information through the parent portal.
Enhanced communication between school and family.

image.alt: Family Account Detail in CapoBrain School Management System
